summary: The Department of Defense provides a pharmacy benefit to over 9 million beneficiaries through TRICARE. In FY 2023, TRICARE spent over $8 billion on prescription drugs for its beneficiaries. DOD's latest pharmacy contract reduced the minimum number of in-network pharmacies by about 25%. DOD pharmacy contractor reports say 98% of beneficiaries were still within a 15-minute drive of a network pharmacy in 2024. Our analysis...
title: Defense Health Care: DOD Should Improve Monitoring of TRICARE Beneficiaries' Access to Prescription Drugs
